form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Use of the Affidavit of Support to Overcome Public Charge Grounds ( (Continued), Form 1-864 ( (1/21/98) Y Page 6

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 Part 7. Use of the Affidavit of Support to Overcome Public Charge Grounds (Continued) I acknowledge that section 213A(a)(1)(B) of the Act grants the sponsored immigrant(s) and any Federal State. local or privase agency that pays any means-tested public benefis to or on behalf of the sponsored immigrand(s) standing 10 sue me for failing 10 meet my obligations under this affidavit of support I agree 10 submis to the personal jurisdiction of any court of the United Scares or of any State, territory. or possession of the United Stares if the court has subject matter jurisdiction of a civil Lowsuis 10 enforce this affidavit of support / agree that no Lawsuit to enforce this affidavis of support shall be barred by any statute of limitations that mighs otherwise apply. so long as the plainsiff initiates the civil lawsuit no laser than sen (10) years after the dase on which a sponsored immigrant last received any means-tested public benefits. Collection of Judgment. / acknowledge that a plainsiff may seek specific performance of my support obligarion Furthermore any money judgmens against me based on this affidavis of support may be collected through the use of a judgement lien under 28 U.S.C. 3201. a writ of execution under 28 U.S.C. 3203, a judicial installment payment order under 28 U.S.C. 3204. garnishment under 28 U.S.C. 3205. or through the use of any corresponding remedy under State law. / may also be held liable for costs of collection, including attorney fees. Concluding Provisions. I FOIA (b)(6) certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that: (a) I know the contents of this affidavis of support signed by me: (b) All the statements in this affidavit of suppor are true and correct; (c) ! make this affidavit of support for I/ : consideration stated in Part 7. freely. and withous any mental reservation or purpose evasion: (d) Income tax returns submitted in support of this affidavit are true copies of the returns filed with the Internal Revenue Service: and (e) Any other evidence submitted is true and CO rect. (Month) (Year) MIAMI, FL at Hammission expires on August 12, Nocary Public or Officer Administering Oach) NOTARY PUBLIC (Tule) #DD141573 If someone other than the sponsor prepared this affidavit of support, that person must complete the following: I certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that I prepared this affidavit of support at the sponsor's request and that this affidavit of support is based on all information of which I have knowledge.
